snippet: The State Department of Transportation will install new concrete barriers on three viaducts along the Bronx River Parkway, following a fatal accident on Sunday.
abstract: New York State Transportation Dept plans to install concrete barriers on three viaducts along the Bronx River Parkway, following an accident that claimed the lives of seven relatives when their car hit a guardrail and then plunged 60 feet from overpass.
lead_paragraph: The State Department of Transportation will install new concrete barriers on three viaducts along the Bronx River Parkway, following a fatal accident on Sunday.

headline.seo: After Accident, Barriers Will Be Added to Bronx Highway
headline.main: New Barriers Planned on Road Where 7 Died
headline.print_headline: New Barriers Planned on Road Where 7 Died
